name: Dr Vilo Strangelow - Part One - The Meeting
name_original: Dr Vilo Strangelow - Part One - The Meeting
description:
This is first part in a multi part project where I am trying to make a game in python. It a text based game and In the first part (this part) you do mainly q&a but introduces you into the story-line. Have fun!!! 

(I am bad so I don't know how to put my code into a executable, soo......  download the file and go to it in a terminal window, type in ( python3 Part_One---The_Meeting.py )  if that does't work (which it should then ask how to do it on yt) sorry :P hopefully i will have figured how to do it properly for the next part :) (if you know please comment on the game with the code on how to do it thanks ) 

- dev
